body.raw:
{
    "quizId": "e599953a-649e-4106-84e4-de1153a03307",
    "content": "Blue is the color of the sky!",
    "answerType": "boolean",
    "choices": "[\"true\",\"false\"]",
    "correctAnswer": "true",
    "explanation": "The sky appears blue to the human eye as the short waves of blue light are scattered more than the other colours in the spectrum, making the blue light more visible."
}
